TopicTitle: I wonder what kind of signal is given to warn people to RUN because rocket launch :D

Articles.Content: I wonder does during shuttle or Soyuz launch does is given any warning signal to clear the launchpad?
I think there's an air raid siren that sounds before launches, but I'm not too sure.
Other than fencing around the launch site to keep people out, I don't know.
you probibly have some kind of noisemaker just to keep birds away from the launch area. tight security takes care of humans.

Holy crap, what's with all the questions?

Anyways, I think it's announcements over a intercom system and security that helps to clear the launch pad before giving mission control the OK to start countdown.
IIRC the warning sirens at KSC are in the Guinness Book as the loudest man-made noise on Earth.
